OrgName.entry: RICHMOND PARK AND BIRKLANDS TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Represents tenants and residents' interests in Richmond Park and Birklands. Events include 3 day trips between April and August.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Mon in the month at 7pm; quarterly (public meeting)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 13
